title: A gift any Apple fan will love! This refurbished iPad Air is under $120
content:
Macworld

Shopping for tech lovers, especially Apple fans, can be tricky. But, what if you could really “wow” them this year? Surprise them this holiday season with a pre-loved iPad Air from 2013. It’s on sale for only $119.97 (reg. $499) through November 16th!

Ideal for work and play, this iPad Air has an A7 chip and comes with iOS 7 to ensure a smooth user experience and enhanced graphics processing. Meanwhile, 1GB of RAM and 16GB of storage allow for seamless multi-tasking. It also features easy Bluetooth 4.0 connection to other wireless devices and WiFi connectivity to hotspots and wireless networks.

This pre-owned iPad Air has a stellar 9.7″ Retina display with a touch-sensitive screen, providing enough room to stream and browse comfortably. Users can also enjoy its 5MP iSight camera for FaceTime and photos, and its impressive 10-hour battery life on a single charge, which makes it an ideal on-the-go device!

Don’t worry about gifting pre-loved tech. This 2013 iPad Air was awarded a Grade B rating, meaning there may be light scuffing or scratches on its exterior, though its performance shouldn’t be impacted.

Wow a special someone with this refurbished iPad Air in Space Gray, now just $119.97 until November 16th at 11:59pm Pacific. No coupon required!
